name: iHackU: Feel the hacker in you
name_original: iHackU: Feel the hacker in you
description:
Want to feel like a hacker? Then, iHackU is the right app for you!!

With iHackU, you create your own identity and other people will try and extract some information from what you created. Don't worry, they can only get information you save in the app: everything else is safe.

You can also hack other people by tapping on their nicknames.
To successfully start a hack, you have to convert a decimal number into its corresponding binary.

In the even of someone trying to hack you, you have to do the same thing to stop it.

All of the people you hacked will be saved and you can see their hacked information.

The game uses CloudKit to store and communicate between people.
